Certainly! Here are some tips for making hobbies more manageable:

1. Choose a hobby that fits your schedule - some hobbies might require you to dedicate a lot of time at once, while others are more flexible.

2. Plan ahead - try to carve out some time in your calendar each week for your hobby, and stick to it as much as possible.

3. Prioritize your hobby - treat your hobby like any other important task or appointment, and make it a priority in your schedule.

4. Find ways to incorporate your hobby into your daily routine - for example, if you love reading, you could read for 20 or 30 minutes during your lunch break or before bed.

5. Be flexible - sometimes life gets in the way, and you might not be able to fit in your hobby as often as you'd like. Don't beat yourself up over it - just try to make time for it whenever you can.

I hope these tips are helpful! Remember, hobbies are an important part of self-care, and it's worth investing the time to make them a regular part of your life.
